title: New Mix: Sevdaliza, Porridge Radio, Fantastic Negrito, more
description:
All Songs Considered's Bob Boilen shares his favorite new tracks this week, including the "femmenoid" sounds of Sevdaliza, Tiny Desk contest winner Fantastic Negrito Porridge Radio and more.

Featured Tracks And Artists:
1. Porridge Radio: "Back To The Radio," From Waterslide, Diving Board, Ladder To The Sky
2. Sevdaliza: "High Alone," From Raving Dahlia (EP)
3. Fantastic Negrito: "Highest Bidder," From White Jesus Black Problems
4. Daniel Rossen: "Unpeopled Space," From You Belong There
5. Roedelius & Story: "Nurzu," From 4 Hands
6. Charbonneau / Amato: "Évaporations," From Synth Works Vol. 2
